backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, paid tier checks, and CRUD operations for photo projects with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Aggregated feature‑to‑file mapping describing implemented app features, related components, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files covering routing, editor components, effects, and project management UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light/dark theme tokens and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, applies theme provider, and gates users through profile setup before showing app layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states and session reset logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form prompting new users for their name and saving an initial profile.
frontend/src/components/consent/ConsentG: Fullscreen consent dialog requiring user acknowledgment before proceeding with the app.
frontend/src/components/editor/CanvasVie: Handles zooming, panning, and rendering of the base image and effect layers, including layer transforms and interaction handles.
frontend/src/components/editor/effects/e: Defines metadata for available visual effects, including paid and free options.
frontend/src/components/editor/EffectsPa: Displays the effects library, manages adding free or paid effects, and triggers upgrade or special flows when needed.
frontend/src/components/editor/export/co: Composites the base image and visible layers onto a canvas and triggers PNG download.
frontend/src/components/editor/ExportBut: Exports the composed image to PNG with consent and paid‑effect checks, showing upgrade prompts when required.
frontend/src/components/editor/hooks/use: Loads an image file into memory and returns its URL and dimensions.
frontend/src/components/editor/LayerHand: Provides draggable handles for moving the selected layer, updating its transform based on cursor movement.
frontend/src/components/editor/LayerInsp: Lists layers with visibility, reordering, and delete controls, and shows editable properties for the selected layer.
frontend/src/components/editor/paid/Dead: Handles uploading a custom photo for the premium effect and creates a corresponding layer.
frontend/src/components/editor/persisten: Serializes editor state into a PhotoProject object and provides a deserializer back to EditorState.
frontend/src/components/editor/PhotoEdit: Main editor page that loads projects, manages editor state and base image upload, and renders the full editing UI with consent gating.
frontend/src/components/editor/SaveProje: Renders a save button and dialog, validating input and calling serialize and save mutations.
frontend/src/components/editor/state/edi: Stores editor state and defines reducer actions for layers, base image, and viewport changes.
Defines type interfaces for transforms, effect layers, and viewport settings.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingH: Displays the landing page hero with branding, description, and background image.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Renders the main landing page with feature cards, premium upsell, and navigation to editor.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the app’s top-level layout with header, footer, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders a simple footer with credits and external link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Shows the app header with navigation, login, and conditional project/editor links.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Displays the user's projects with options to open or delete them, handling authentication, loading states, and navigation.
frontend/src/components/upgrade/UpgradeP: Provides a modal UI for upgrading to a paid tier, calling the upgrade mutation and showing premium feature info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout functions through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, paid access, and project CRUD operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for theming, including dark mode and component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, and clear URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, extended animations, shadows, radii, and includes typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a photo‑editing app’s features, versions, requirements, and current state for planning and tracking functionality.
